text: Steven Angelo White (September 18, 1928 â€“ February 1, 2021) was an American four-star admiral who served in the United States Navy from 1948 until 1985. He was the 19th and last Chief of Naval Material. White died on February 1, 2021 in Charlottesville, Virginia at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Military people from California
